attributes.action: Postpone the revised GCSE in Maths and English set to be taken this summer.
attributes.additional_details: I am a primary school teacher and the director of private day nurseries but more importantly a parent of a Year 11 pupil.
attributes.background: Current Year 11 pupils who are due to sit the revised GCSE exams this summer in Maths and English have attained well below their expected previous grades in recent mock examinations.  This is due to the escalated rate in which the revised curriculum has been introduced.
